long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BrandShader: Get the colors & fonts behind your beloved brands

Ever wonder what colors and fonts your favorite brands are using? BrandShader is here to capture and save brand colors and fonts with just one click, whether you're a designer or developer. Dive deep into brand aesthetics, and find inspiration with ease. 

BrandShader is 100% free forever—no trials, no subscriptions.

Why You’ll Love BrandShader:

1-Click Brand Color & Font Capture: 
Discover any color or font used on a website and save it instantly, perfect for replicating top brand styles.

Google Fonts at Your Fingertips: 
Download Google Fonts with a single click, right from any website that uses them.

Quick Search for Non-Google Fonts: 
Found a font that’s not in Google Fonts? No problem—BrandShader helps you search and find it instantly.

Bookmark Your Inspirations: 
Save your favorite websites as design inspiration and create a personal library of creative ideas.

Downloadable Color Palettes: 
Export color palettes as JSON files, ready for use in your design tools for seamless integration.

Totally Free, Forever: 
No subscriptions, no trials—BrandShader is completely free and always will be.

BrandShader is built to make your design process faster and more enjoyable. Whether you're creating websites, apps, or just browsing for fresh inspiration, BrandShader gives you the tools to capture and use the best visual elements from your favorite brands.
